duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business to business sales efforts.
Engage in proactive sales activities, including cold calling, face-to-face meetings, and networking.
Utilize CRM platform to acquire and maintain client relationships and drive sales.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and client retention.
Participate in training and development programs to enhance sales skills and knowledge.
Meet high standards for sales performance and strive for continuous improvement.
